originalText.text: Sharna Striar, PH.D., R.N. has been an incredibly positive influence in my life.  I began working with her almost 3 years ago during a very difficult time in my life, and she has provided tremendous support and encouragement during our time together. I have always felt that she has listened carefully to my concerns and issues, and has helped me come up with very helpful resolutions.  She has been an invaluable person that has always been there for me during the hard times.  I highly recommend her if you are looking for a thoughtful and kind therapist.

originalText.text: Dr Sharna Striar, PhD,RN has been a great help to my overall mental well-being.  Initially I was a total skeptic about therapy, but after having therapy with Dr. Striar for a number of years, I wish I had met her sooner. She is always professional and prepared and I found her remarkable in her ability to know when to push me and when I needed a gentle approach. She helped me to move through complicated issues of PTSD and abuse- and ultimately put the past into perspective.  I owe a lot of my happiness to Dr.Striar and would highly recommend her to anyone.

text.text: Dr Sharna Striar, PhD,RN has been a great help to my overall mental well-being.  Initially I was a total skeptic about therapy, but after having therapy with Dr. Striar for a number of years, I wish I had met her sooner. She is always professional and prepared and I found her remarkable in her ability to know when to push me and when I needed a gentle approach. She helped me to move through complicated issues of PTSD and abuse- and ultimately put the past into perspective.  I owe a lot of my happiness to Dr.Striar and would highly recommend her to anyone.

originalText.text:
Dr. Striar is a compassionate, innovative , open minded therapist who has guided my husband and I out of some sticky situations and has also helped me to find a greater understanding of my own issues.  I have been working with her for over four years and have never been disappointed.  I know I can count on her to provide guidance and support without judgement in a cosy environment whenever needed.
She employs a highly effective combination of talk therapy, exercises and real life examples, and I feel the results are clearly palpable.  I feel I can ask her specific questions on how to improve, and she has helpful answers; I don't have to just talk and talk until even I am sick of hearing about myself.
I would definitely recommend her for both couples and individual therapy on a variety of topics.

originalText.text: I was referred to Dr. Striar in my mid-twenties and have been seeing her on and off for the last few years. During this time, she has helped me become the confident poised woman I am today. I would highly recommend Dr. Striar to anyone in need.

originalText.text: Dr. Sharna is phenomenal. She really challenges your own perceptions and views. But she does it in a very compassionate manner. Highly recommend!!!
